verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] moving to reverse Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: moving] [ARG1: to reverse Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears] .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is moving to [V: reverse] [ARG1: Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears] .
The Trump administration is moving to reverse [ARG0: Obama - era rules] [V: barring] [ARG1: hunters on some public lands in Alaska] [ARG2: from baiting brown bears] .
The Trump administration is moving to reverse Obama - era rules barring [ARG0: hunters on some public lands in Alaska] from [V: baiting] [ARG1: brown bears] .
